title:
ASPS Oral Board Preparation Course
            August 21-23, 2025
main_content: Chair: Sami Khan, MD | Co-Chair: Smita Ramanadham, MD

The 2025 ASPS Oral Board Preparation Course is a live, virtual learning experience that is both comprehensive and interactive. Take advantage of this unique opportunity to review board-relevant cases to build your confidence and become better prepared to take the American Board of Plastic Surgery (ABPS) Oral Board Examination.
Valuable highlights for this program include ASPS-exclusive oral exam simulation sessions and the faculty-reviewed case book sessions.
Back by Popular Demand: Realistic oral examination simulation sessions – limited space available – additional fee required
This course will be available in live format only. A recording will not be available on ASPS EdNet afterward.
Disclaimer: Completion of this course does not imply or guarantee a successful outcome on the examination or certification efforts.

Accreditation Statements






                        Register Now
                    






            ASPS Oral Board Preparation Course
            August 21-23, 2025

Chair: Sami Khan, MD | Co-Chair: Smita Ramanadham, MD
Prepare Virtually. Test Successfully.
The 2025 ASPS Oral Board Preparation Course is a live, virtual learning experience that is both comprehensive and interactive. Take advantage of this unique opportunity to review board-relevant cases to build your confidence and become better prepared to take the American Board of Plastic Surgery (ABPS) Oral Board Examination.
Valuable highlights for this program include ASPS-exclusive oral exam simulation sessions and the faculty-reviewed case book sessions.
Registration Includes

Focused sessions for Oral Exam preparation
100+ case scenarios reviewed
Practice exam sessions
Individual case book review available by appointment
Cleft lip drawing instruction videos

Simulation Sessions & Case Book Reviews
Back by Popular Demand: Realistic oral examination simulation sessions – limited space available – additional fee required



Sessions
Date
Time




Case Book Review 1-4
Thursday, August 21
1:00 PM - 1:30 PM CDT


Oral Exam Simulation 1-3
Friday, August 22
7:45 AM - 8:15 AM CDT


Case Book Review 5-7
Friday, August 22
11:30 AM - 12:00 PM CDT


Oral Exam Simulation 4-7
Friday, August 22
12:15 PM - 1:15 PM CDT


Case Book Review 8-11
Friday, August 22
1:00 PM - 1:30 PM CDT


Oral Exam Simulation 8-11
Friday, August 22
3:15 PM - 4:15 PM CDT


Oral Exam Simulation 12-16
Saturday, August 23
7:45 AM - 8:15 AM CDT


Case Book Review 12-16
Saturday, August 23
11:30 AM - 12:00 PM CDT


Oral Exam Simulation 17-18
Saturday, August 23
2:30 PM - 3:30 PM CDT



This course will be available in live format only. A recording will not be available on ASPS EdNet afterward.
Disclaimer: Completion of this course does not imply or guarantee a successful outcome on the examination or certification efforts.
